column3: “A sativa lover's dream. Euphoric, soaring high.  I'm bipolar, and with this strain I can mostly avoid or shorten my depressive bouts.  Yet it doesn't propel me into a manic state the way some sativas do. Only disadvantage is that it reeks, so not good if you're smoking while driving or are in another place where cops may smell it.”

“Hawaiʻi ʻ78

also known as: Sweet lady of Waiāhole"

column1: This is a very special landrace Hawaiian strain brought to you from the same neighborhood where Jurassic Park was filmed as well as many other Hollywood blockbusters

column3: “Too bad Jurassic park was filmed on Kauai not Oahu... Never tried this strain, but the write up lost some credibility with that statement.”
